name: @dark-engine/core
description: The lightweight and powerful UI rendering engine without dependencies and written in TypeScript (Browser, Node.js, Android, iOS, Windows, Linux, macOS)
author: AlexPlex

scripts.build: npm run before-build && npm run build:pipeline && npm run format
scripts.build:pipeline: npm run build:types && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:umd:dev && npm run build:umd:prod
